Text:
Every single one of this Rum Diary torrents is flooded with Leeches! I think mods should introduce upload-download ratio, like some private sites. If you don't have a positive UL-DL ratio, you should be unable to download any more torrents and banned. This is leading to nowhere. Leeches are destroying the torrents and all the hard work creators put in making them. 
I hope you will consider my suggestion.
